about_the_game:
Explore the Knowledge VR Pack:

Life in Water VR: Dive into a mesmerizing virtual reality experience that immerses you in the breathtaking beauty and diverse ecosystem of the underwater world. Explore vibrant coral reefs, encounter graceful marine life, and marvel at majestic blue whales. Experience the awe-inspiring depths of the ocean, capturing the sheer size and magnificence of marine life.

Chandrayaan VR: Embark on a journey to the moon and relive a historic moment with our Chandrayaan VR experience. Immerse yourself in the Indian space mission Chandrayaan, learning about its entire journey to the moon in stunning virtual reality. Gain insights into the science and technology behind this remarkable space program.

Inside Human Body VR: Take an immersive journey deep into the mysteries of the human body. Explore the wonders of the respiratory and digestive systems in vivid detail. Witness the intricate network of airways, from the nostrils to the alveoli in the lungs. Discover the process of oxygen exchange and the journey of air through the bronchial tubes. Follow the path of digestion, starting from the mouth, through the rhythmic contractions of the oesophagus, to the stomach where food is broken down by digestive enzymes.
detailed_description:
Explore the Knowledge VR Pack:

Life in Water VR: Dive into a mesmerizing virtual reality experience that immerses you in the breathtaking beauty and diverse ecosystem of the underwater world. Explore vibrant coral reefs, encounter graceful marine life, and marvel at majestic blue whales. Experience the awe-inspiring depths of the ocean, capturing the sheer size and magnificence of marine life.

Chandrayaan VR: Embark on a journey to the moon and relive a historic moment with our Chandrayaan VR experience. Immerse yourself in the Indian space mission Chandrayaan, learning about its entire journey to the moon in stunning virtual reality. Gain insights into the science and technology behind this remarkable space program.

Inside Human Body VR: Take an immersive journey deep into the mysteries of the human body. Explore the wonders of the respiratory and digestive systems in vivid detail. Witness the intricate network of airways, from the nostrils to the alveoli in the lungs. Discover the process of oxygen exchange and the journey of air through the bronchial tubes. Follow the path of digestion, starting from the mouth, through the rhythmic contractions of the oesophagus, to the stomach where food is broken down by digestive enzymes.
developers: Klip VR Immersive Technologies Pvt Ltd
name: Knowledge VR Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-9900K CPU
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, Oculus Quest 2, Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-9900K CPU
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, Oculus Quest 2, Standing or Room Scale

short_description: The Knowledge VR Pack includes "Inside Human Body VR" for human anatomy exploration, "Chandrayaan VR" for a moon mission experience, and "Life in Water VR" for diving into marine ecosystems. It combines education and adventure in an immersive virtual journey.
